# Missing values

We create heatmap and visna() to analyze missing values and check whether a pattern exists for missing values and the ratio of missing values in each column. 

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(gridExtra)

df<- read.csv("resource/winequality-red.csv", sep = ';', head = T)
```

## Heatmap
```{r,warning=FALSE,message=FALSE}
library(heatmaply)
heatmaply_na(
  df[1:30, ],
  xlab = '11 attributes and 1 outcome',
  colors=viridis(100),
  showticklabels = c(TRUE, FALSE),
  key.title = 'NA ratio'
)
```

## `vis_miss()` plot from **visdat**
```{r,warning=FALSE,message=FALSE}
library(naniar)
vis_miss(df)
```
